Title: The Boar
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Julieanne Smolinski, Julieanne Smolinski (executive story editor), David Budin (staff writer), Brendan McCarthy (staff writer)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Grace freaks out when Phil contacts her again. Sol spends the night at the beach house.
